title: 2.11.0.Final : rest->grpc unit test fails. The dependent grpc service must be instantiated during test automagically

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

A grpc service that is behind rest service is UNAVAILABLE during junit. I expect it to start. 

Before I moved to 2.11, the test suit was working.

How to get dependent grpc services available during quarkus unit tests?

Distraction please ignore: The reason why I have a grpc behind REST - is to support both REST and GRPC version of api -- if quarkus has a better way of having rest & grpc without code duplication that would be nice. 

Code reference for reproducing : #26905
